components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Sudani Network in Sudan from pre-registered Sender ID

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Sudani Network in Sudan from pre-registered Sender ID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Middle East & Africa

incidents.name: Inbound Message Delivery Failure to a subset of Twilio's Denmark Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience inbound SMS message failures to a subset of Twilio Denmark long code phone numbers. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A third party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Customers are able to submit their Campaign requests. However, reviews are expected to take longer. Twilio continues to escalate the situation and work with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide updates as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. Campaign reviews are expected to take over 15 business days approximately until the situation is resolved. Twilio is working with the provider to help expedite this process. We will provide another update on 03/03/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to face delays while vetting 10DLC campaigns. A 3rd party agency is reviewing campaigns manually and due to the high volume of requests, a queue has built up. We will provide another update every 7 days. Next update will be provided on 02/24/2023 at 10:45 am Pacific Time or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 18 March 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 19 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK.
Impacted Products - Carrier
Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in Egypt is conducting a planned maintenance from 18 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 18 March 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Etisalat handsets in Egypt.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice and SMS carrier partner maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice and SMS carrier partner in the UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT until 19 March 2023 at 05:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call drops to and from UK handsets via a subset of local Long codes and there could be intermittent SMS failures from UK handsets to a subset of Twilio Long codes.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 March 2023 at 15:00 PDT until 19 March 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Tigo network in Senegal is conducting a planned maintenance from 19 March 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 19 March 2023 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of handset in Senegal.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Twilio is conducting a planned maintenance beginning 20 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT until 25 March 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, WhatsApp senders may each experience downtimes of up to 15 minutes, which can result in delayed deliveries for WhatsApp messages sent to/from these senders during this brief period.

The Megafon network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 March 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 20 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

The Yota network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 March 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 20 March 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Yota Russia handsets.

The Tigo network in Senegal is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 March 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 21 March 2023 at 22:00 PDT . During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from a subset of handset in Senegal.

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Impacted Products: SNA, Lookup SIM Swap and Identity Match
